comment: Not showing in Android Wear app, uninstalled.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Trina, 
thank you for the feedback. 
We were testing out the Android wear 2.0 system and have updated on April. Please update your app. 
Hope this answers your question/issue, if you have any other questions/issues please contact us via email(ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) Thank you.
